marklogic.body: "I'm sorry, Sophie, but we're going to have to erase your memories again. Because, you see, we are *tears realistic human face masks* ALIENS! FROM ANOTHER PLANET! IN SPACE!" *Sophie Faints* "Oh man, that was hilarious! I think she really believed us! Now we just need to take her outside, dry Off the rain, repaint the house, replace the flowers, move all the furniture slightly to the left, and start speaking in Polish. THAT'S WHAT YOU GET, SOPHIE. THAT'S WHAT YOU GET."
